JOB DESCRIPTION: The role of Technology Lead, is expected to interface with key stakeholders and apply technical proficiency across different stages of the Software Development Life Cycle including Production Support, Requirements Elicitation, Design, Build, Testing and documentation.    Expected to play an important role in in handling enhancement requests.    Drive client workshops to analyze existing processes, identify gaps and pain points and propose enhanced / optimized solutions based on industry standards.   Candidate with 7+ years Talend Big data   Hands-on experience in PL SQL, Bash scripting and Spark streaming   Good exposure to Data Warehousing
